sn15.4:1.3: Pubba koti na pannayati avijjanivarananam sattanam tanhasamyojananam sandhavatam samsaratam.
sn15.4:1.4: Tam kim mannatha, bhikkhave, katamam nu kho bahutaram, yam va vo imina dighena addhuna sandhavatam samsaratam matuthannam pitam, yam va catusu mahasamuddesu udakan”ti?
sn15.4:1.5: “Yatha kho mayam, bhante, bhagavata dhammam desitam ajanama, etadeva, bhante, bahutaram yam no imina dighena addhuna sandhavatam samsaratam matuthannam pitam, na tveva catusu mahasamuddesu udakan”ti.
sn15.4:2.1: “Sadhu sadhu, bhikkhave, sadhu kho me tumhe, bhikkhave, evam dhammam desitam ajanatha.
sn15.4:2.2: Etadeva, bhikkhave, bahutaram yam vo imina dighena addhuna sandhavatam samsaratam matuthannam pitam, na tveva catusu mahasamuddesu udakam.
